verses.name: Jeremiah 25:34
verses.text: Howl, ye shepherds, and cry; and wallow yourselves in the ashes, ye principal of the flock: for the days of your slaughter and of your dispersions are accomplished; and ye shall fall like a pleasant vessel.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:35
verses.text: And the shepherds shall have no way to flee, nor the principal of the flock to escape.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:36
verses.text: A voice of the cry of the shepherds, and an howling of the principal of the flock, shall be heard: for the Lord hath spoiled their pasture.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:37
verses.text: And the peaceable habitations are cut down because of the fierce anger of the Lord.
